title: Request for Consulting Services
description: MAS Request for Consulting Assistance form.

options.label: Do not add to email list
Do not add to email list

defn.help_pre:
What assistance are you
looking for at this time?  Please
be as specific as you can about the nature of this project  so we can find the right consultant to help
you.
defn.label: Details

#children.#text: and then click this checkbox to confirm you are authorized and approve.

MAS does not charge fees for its services, but we do ask organizations that are financially able to do so to consider giving MAS a donation at the completion of a project. MAS relies on donations to cover its operating expenses.
If you have any issues with this form, please email
